component_compliance.name: Component Compliance
solutions: Go to the Aircraft Component Compliance screen to view the incompliant components. Replace all the listed components with units purchased from your local DJI Agras dealer.

e_damage_avionics.name: Avionics Board: Possible Electronics-level Damage
solutions: Observe the error's persistence. If error goes away and does not persist, ignore.
If error persists replace the Avionics Board.

e_damage_esc_{MOTOR}.name: ESC {SAME[MOTOR]}: Electronics-level Damage
solutions: Observe the error's persistence. If error goes away and does not persist, ignore.
If error persists replace the ESC.

e_damage_radar_fwd_RF_board.name: Electronics-level Damage of the Forward Radar's Internal Board
solutions: Observe the error's persistence. If error goes away and does not persist, ignore.
If error persists replace the Forward Radar Module.

e_damage_radar_rear_RF_board.name: Electronics-level Damage of the Rear Radar's Internal Board
solutions: Observe the error's persistence. If error goes away and does not persist, ignore.
If error persists replace the Rear Radar Module.
